name: Chocolate Velvet Cheesecake
description: Say cheese…cake! Make your next baking sesh a little sweeter and a whole lot more decadent with this silky, chocolate cheesecake. Every bite is smooth and velvety (what can I say, it’s literally in the name). Whether you opt for the ease of using premade pie shells or decide to make your own (it’s easy!), this cheesecake will be a sweet success.

ingredients.name: chocolate wafer or gluten-free cookie crumbs

preparation: Combine chocolate wafer crumbs with butter. Press into 9" springform pan.
Using a stand mixer or hand mixer, beat cream cheese and mix until smooth. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Add yogurt and beat until smooth. Pour into crust.
Bake 40 min. Cool to room temperature. Refrigerate before serving.
tips: Slash prep time and use 2 premade chocolate crumb pie shells. Add filling; bake 30 min.
Place a pan of water in the bottom of the oven to promote even baking and reduce cracking.
